summary:
\"Texture change for the texture change :)\" 
 It Give\'s Armored Bikini studded leather look.
descriptionHtml:
\"Texture change for the texture change :)\" 
 It Give\'s Armored Bikini studded leather look. 

Non standalone! it\'s just addon and Requires both:
     UNP Armored Bikini for the mod itself.
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10020)
     and UNP armored bikini retextures, darker chainmail body (base or skinny version).
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10507)	

     Instalation:
 Make a copy of oryginal files if you want  to return to the old look in future.
 Unzip and place Data folder in your Skyrim directory, if asked to overwrite, click yes.

Known Issues: 
Gloves firstperson mesh has a wierd texture directory... Maybe Ortog models share some textures with other mod. Anyway, i didn\'t have any troubles in game. 
If you have problems, download the Glove inventory and...   file.

Thanks to both ,Ortog and Rockslinger for their work.
And of course to Dimon99...

Since mod contains only my textures, it\'s free to use.
author: hagrid

files.name: Glove inventory and firstperson look fix
files.fileName: Glove inventory and firstperson look fix-21324-1-0.rar
